auto..module-banners_grid-%s .slide-content >: width: min(calc(var(--image-width) * 1px), 100%); height: auto; aspect-ratio: var(--image-width) / var(--image-height)

true..module-banners_grid-%s .banners-grid.au: margin-inline-start: calc(0px - var(--scroll-padding, 0px)); margin-inline-end: calc(0px - var(--scroll-padding, 0px)); --fr: var(--item-width)

cursor: var(--cursor); grid-auto-flow: column; overflow-x:auto; overflow-y:hidden; padding-inline-start:var(--scroll-padding, 0px); padding-inline-end: var(--scroll-padding, 0px); padding-top:var(--top-padding, 0px); padding-bottom: var(--bottom-padding, 0px)
